nodes.purpose: Zoom Meeting Trigger
Download Transcript
Analyze Transcript
Transform Action Items
Create Asana Tasks
Send Summary to PM Tool

state.userPrompt: “After a Zoom meeting ends, download the transcript, summarize key decisions, extract action items with deadlines, and add them directly to my project management tool.”

discovered.purpose: Make a simple GET request to retrieve data from an API
Send JSON data to an API endpoint
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Send a message to an AI model and get response
Connect to Zoom API to download meeting transcripts after meetings end
Add extracted action items with deadlines to Asana project management tool

workflow.name: Zoom Meeting Transcript to Action Items Workflow

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and create a structured summary from meeting transcripts.

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with assigned persons and deadlines, 3) Important discussion points. Format as JSON with fields: decisions[], action_items[{item, assignee, deadline, priority}], summary. Transcript: {{ $('Download Transcript').item.json.body }}

buildPhases.description: Workflow starts when a Zoom meeting ends and meeting data becomes available. The Zoom node acts as the trigger to initiate the transcript processing workflow.
Downloads the meeting transcript file from Zoom's API using the meeting information from the trigger. Retrieves the raw transcript content for analysis.

Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

validatedWorkflow.name: Zoom Meeting Transcript to Action Items Workflow

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and create a structured summary from meeting transcripts.

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with assigned persons and deadlines, 3) Important discussion points. Format as JSON with fields: decisions[], action_items[{item, assignee, deadline, priority}], summary. Transcript: {{ $('Download Transcript').item.json.body }}

message.message: Invalid value for 'operation'. Must be one of: complete
message.fix: Change operation to one of the valid options

message.message: Required property 'Workspace Name or ID' is missing

errors.message: Node-level properties notes are in the wrong location. They must be at the node level, not inside parameters.

details.fix:
Move these properties from node.parameters to the node level. Example:
{
  "name": "Create Asana Tasks",
  "type": "n8n-nodes-base.asana",
  "parameters": { /* operation-specific params */ },
  "onError": "continueErrorOutput",  // ✅ Correct location
  "retryOnFail": true,               // ✅ Correct location
  "executeOnce": true,               // ✅ Correct location
  "disabled": false,                 // ✅ Correct location
  "credentials": { /* ... */ }       // ✅ Correct location
}

errors.message: Workflow validation failed: e.message.includes is not a function

warnings.message: Workflow has no trigger nodes. It can only be executed manually.

message.suggestion: Use n8n credentials or expressions instead of hardcoding sensitive values

warnings.message: Expression warning: meetingId: Using $json but node might not have input data
Expression warning: url: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: messages.values[1].content: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: name: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: notes: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: assignee: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: dueOn: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: additionalFields.priority: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: bodyParameters.parameters[0].value: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: bodyParameters.parameters[1].value: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)
Expression warning: bodyParameters.parameters[2].value: Possible missing $ prefix for variable (e.g., use $json instead of json)

reasoning: Fixed 'Analyze Transcript' node: Changed typeVersion from 1.3 to 1.1 to match maximum supported version
Fixed 'Analyze Transcript' node: Changed operation from 'message' to 'complete' as required by validation
Fixed 'Create Asana Tasks' node: Added required 'workspace' parameter using variable reference
Fixed 'Create Asana Tasks' node: Moved 'notes' property from parameters to node level as required by validation rules

Fixed the workspace parameter by replacing the variable expression with a placeholder workspace ID. The Asana node requires a specific workspace ID from your Asana account - you'll need to replace '1234567890123456' with your actual workspace ID from Asana
The workflow validation error appears to be a system-level issue that should resolve once the node configuration is corrected

Fixed the 'workspace' parameter by setting it to an empty string instead of the invalid value '1234567890123456'. The workspace field needs to be configured with a valid workspace ID from your Asana account - you'll need to select this from the dropdown when configuring the node in n8n
The workflow validation error 'e.message.includes is not a function' appears to be an internal n8n validation issue that should resolve once the invalid workspace parameter is corrected
Fixed the empty workspace parameter by setting it to use a workflow variable '{{ $vars.asana_workspace_id }}' which should be configured with a valid Asana workspace ID
The workflow validation error appears to be a system-level issue that should resolve once the node configuration is corrected
Fixed expression syntax by removing the '=' prefix from all expressions - n8n expressions should use {{ }} format without the leading equals sign
The workspace validation error is likely due to the expression format issue - with proper {{ }} syntax, the variable should resolve correctly
Fixed all parameter expressions to use proper n8n expression format: workspace, name, projectId, assignee, dueOn, priority, and notes fields

old.userPrompt: “After a Zoom meeting ends, download the transcript, summarize key decisions, extract action items with deadlines, and add them directly to my project management tool.”

discovered.purpose: Make a simple GET request to retrieve data from an API
Send JSON data to an API endpoint
Transform data structure using JavaScript
Send a message to an AI model and get response
Connect to Zoom API to download meeting transcripts after meetings end
Add extracted action items with deadlines to Asana project management tool

workflow.name: Zoom Meeting Transcript to Action Items Workflow

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and create a structured summary from meeting transcripts.

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with assigned persons and deadlines, 3) Important discussion points. Format as JSON with fields: decisions[], action_items[{item, assignee, deadline, priority}], summary. Transcript: {{ $('Download Transcript').item.json.body }}

buildPhases.description: Workflow starts when a Zoom meeting ends and meeting data becomes available. The Zoom node acts as the trigger to initiate the transcript processing workflow.
Downloads the meeting transcript file from Zoom's API using the meeting information from the trigger. Retrieves the raw transcript content for analysis.

Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

Send JSON data to an API endpoint
Transform data structure using JavaScript

  "project_id": "{{ $('Extract Action Items').item.json.project_id }}",
  "tasks": {{ JSON.stringify($('Extract Action Items').item.json.action_items) }},
  "source": "zoom_meeting",
  "meeting_id": "{{ $('Zoom Trigger').item.json.object.id }}",
  "meeting_date": "{{ $('Zoom Trigger').item.json.object.start_time }}"
}

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and create a structured summary from meeting transcripts.

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with assigned persons and deadlines, 3) Important discussion points. parameters.content:
## 📥 Triggers
Workflow starts when a Zoom meeting ends and meeting data becomes available. The Zoom node acts as the trigger to initiate the transcript processing workflow.

## 📊 Inputs
Downloads the meeting transcript file from Zoom's API using the meeting information from the trigger. Retrieves the raw transcript content for analysis.

## ⚙️ Transform
Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.

## 🔗 Integration
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

## 🚀 Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with 💚 by Ghost Team.

Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

## 📊 Inputs
Downloads the meeting transcript file from Zoom's API using the meeting information from the trigger. Retrieves the raw transcript content for analysis.

## ⚙️ Transform
Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.

## 🔗 Integration
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

## 🚀 Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.

workflow.name: Zoom Meeting Transcript to Action Items Workflow

values.content: You are an expert meeting analyst. Extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and create a structured summary from meeting transcripts.

Analyze this meeting transcript and extract: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with assigned persons and deadlines, 3) Important discussion points. Format as JSON with fields: decisions[], action_items[{item, assignee, deadline, priority}], summary. Transcript: {{ $('Download Transcript').item.json.body }}

parameters.content:
## 📥 Triggers
Workflow starts when a Zoom meeting ends and meeting data becomes available. The Zoom node acts as the trigger to initiate the transcript processing workflow.

## 📊 Inputs
Downloads the meeting transcript file from Zoom's API using the meeting information from the trigger. Retrieves the raw transcript content for analysis.

## ⚙️ Transform
Uses OpenAI to analyze the transcript content and extract key decisions, action items with deadlines, and meeting summary. Then transforms the AI response into structured data suitable for project management tools.

## 🔗 Integration
Creates tasks in Asana project management tool and sends summary data to external PM tool API. Both actions happen in parallel to efficiently distribute the extracted action items.
